name: Whirlipede
description: The Curlipede Pokémon. It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll a 1d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of poison damage equal to this Pokémon’s proficiency modifier.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is increased by 10 feet while in an environment related to its type (DM Discretion).
